title: Russia asks Facebook how it complies with data law - Ifax
text:
April 12, 2018 / 2:39 PM / Updated an hour ago Russia asks Facebook how it complies with data law - Ifax Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian communications watchdog Roskomnadzor has asked Facebook to explain how it is complying with a Russian law on data localization, the Interfax news agency reported on Thursday. FILE PHOTO: A 3D-printed Facebook logo are seen in front of displayed binary digits in this illustration taken, March 18, 2018. REUTERS/Dado Ruvic/Illustration/File Photo 
Roskomnadzor has said earlier it would carry out an audit into Facebookâ€™s compliance with Russian legislation in the second half of 2018. Reporting by Jack Stubbs; writing by Maria Kiselyova; Editing by Alison Williams
